resources.string:
The rtsp URL should be entered as rtsp://EyeCGas Camera IP Address>/video.sdp 
 
Where to find the EyeCGas IP Address? 
 
In EyeCGas camera navigate to Menu > Settings > System Info > Network > WiFi HotSpot > IP
How to enter rtsp URL? \n For EyeCGas IP = 192.168.1.2 then enter rtsp://192.168.1.5/video.sdp
